DOC.brief_summary: Study Hypothesis : The combination aerobic resistance exercise training improve walk speed compare either individual intervention . Brief Summary : Sixty hemodialysis participant meet inclusion exclusion criterion randomize 20 week supervise exercise , use either : ( ) on-dialysis aerobic exercise use bike ergometer ; ( ii ) pre-dialysis leg strength train use weight ; ( iii ) . The primary outcome walk speed 4-metres . Secondary outcome include : ( ) short physical performance battery ; ( ii ) health-related quality life [ EuroQOL-5D-5L ] ; ( iii ) Dialysis recovery time ; ( iv ) Nottingham extend activity daily live ( EADL ) index ; ( v ) Leg strength ; ( vi ) body composition anthropometry .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Hemodialysis Based Exercise Strength Improvement Study
